definitions.definition: as found in nature and not involving anything made or done by people:
A natural ability or characteristic is one that you were born with:
Natural food or drink is pure and has no chemical substances added to it and is therefore thought to be healthy:
a parent who caused someone to be born, although possibly not their legal parent or the parent who raised them
someone who was born with the right characteristics or abilities for doing a particular thing:
examples: She won't have any troubles learning to ride a horse - you can see she's a natural.
